content:
#26563 makes a small design note that, in the Settings overlays, the alignment of the play icon next to the Notification Sound setting is not centered.

This is the case for that setting in the Personal Settings / Notifications tab (https://chat.zulip.org/#settings/notifications) and the Organization Settings / Default User Settings tab (https://chat.zulip.org/#organization/organization-level-user-defaults).

Seems like a small tweak for someone to make, but wanted to have a quick check-in here to make sure the alignment as it is currently isn't intentional or preferred.

Screenshot-from-2023-08-24-11-46-23.png
3 messages were moved from this topic to #issues > notification sound settings not updated until saved by Lauryn Menard.
Yeah, that looks like wonky alignment to me.
Yeah that's surely not intentional and it's worth someone putting up a quirk PR to tweak it. (It's a component we only use in that one place).

Put up #26603 for this, taking the occasion to not only fix the alignment, but leave some comments and an example for how we might go about making more of the settings interface responsive--starting with the input groups.
